content.rendered: Caroline Hansson is a partner in the firm’s Corporate Commercial practice group as well as the firm’s Health Care & Life Sciences industry sector group. Caroline has extensive experience from assisting Swedish and international clients, in the public as well as the private sector, in legally complex commercial projects where contract law issues are involved, with a particular focus on large-scale development agreements, industrial cooperation projects, purchase agreements and service agreements as well as sales and distribution agreements. She also advises on general matters related to corporate law and contract management. Caroline’s experience spans a wide range of industries, such as life sciences, manufacturing and financial services. She also regularly lectures law students in areas such as international sales law and negotiation techniques. Caroline joined the firm in 2011 and has also worked for a period at the firm’s New York office.
